snippet: The agreement, which the opera said would save 3 million euros a year, will keep the musicians on staff in exchange for pay cuts and a pledge not to go on strike.
abstract: The agreement, which the opera said would save 3 million euros a year, will keep the musicians on staff in exchange for pay cuts and a pledge not to go on strike.

headline.main: Rome Opera's Management and Musicians Agree to End Standoff
headline.print_headline: Deal Seals End of Opera Standoff
